name: The Legend of Aeolus
description:
Controls:

WASD/Arrow Keys  - Move

Space/up/W - Jump

Z/Left Click (Hold) - control wind (only after gaining a wind power-up)

--

For AZERTY keyboards:

QZSD - Move

Space/up/Q - Jump

W/Left Click (Hold) - control wind

--

Boost your way up the mountain!

Aeolus, the keeper of the winds, is tired of being tossed around by the gods. He embarks on a quest to climb Mount Olympus (with his wind powers!) and claim a spot on the sacred mountain.

In this game, the user can control when the wind blows, as a reference to Aeolus, a side character from The Odyssey who had the power to capture wind spirits and put them in bags for later use. 

Made in 72 hours or less for Mini Jam 101 by Rishit Khare

Thanks to the following people for their free open-use art assets:

 - Ansimuz : clouds and sky background

 - Kacper Woźniak : Character sprite base (I edited on top of it)

 - Trixie : Tile-map assets
